text: The Evolution of Katherine is a 1914 play by the British writer E. Temple Thurston. In 1916 it was adapted into a film Driven directed by Maurice Elvey. It is one of a number of Thurston's works to be turned into films.Goble p.460 The play is sometimes itself alternatively known as Driven. ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1914 plays Category:British plays adapted into films
title: The Evolution of Katherine
